item.description:
PechaKucha-Worcester
Music/Arts - Listening Party
Price: free
Date: Sunday, September 13, 2009
Time: 7:20pm - 10:20pm
Location:
55 Pearl G.A.R. Hall
55 Pearl Street
City/Town:
Worcester, MA
508-755-7327

Description:
8 creative minds sharing their ideas. 20 Slides and 8 Seconds a Slide... Come Listen Learn Share Inspire
Come join the conversation!
doors open at 7:20
presentations start at 8:20
All Ages welcome. No Cover Charge. Cash Bar.
Hors D'oeuvres sponsored by 55 Pearl
item.how_to_find_us: Go tot he Hall and Look!

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP
